title: Smart Contract
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: smart-contract-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0009
	- preferred-term:: Smart Contract
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Self-executing programmable code within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
	- source:: [[ISO/IEC 23257:2021]], [[IEEE 2418.1]], [[NIST NISTIR]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:SmartContract
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: bc:VirtualObject
	- belongsToDomain:: [[BlockchainDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ConceptualLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: smart-contract-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Blockchain Entity]]
		- is-subclass-of:: [[DistributedDataStructure]]
	- #### CrossDomainBridges
	  id:: smart-contract-bridges
	  collapsed:: true
		- dt:uses:: [[Bias Detection Methods]]
		- bc:authenticates:: [[DigitalAvatar]]
		- bc:governs:: [[Marketplace]]

ontology.definition: Self-executing programmable code within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
